channel.title: Algorithms on Abu Baker Al-Shammari
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithms on Abu Baker Al-Shammari

item.title: Hashing
item.description: Some basic information about hashing I would like to remember you that there are many different types of hashing, the one I am using is used in my course. The code is from Algorithms in C++ by Robert Segdewick. In this type of hashing you will find array, keys and return value. The integer M is the length of the array, in this case it is 17 (0-16). You got two different hash types, where k is the letter number (A = 1).
